name: Just Click The Button
description:
Just Click The Button takes the clicker genre and combines it with the arena shooter-reverse bullethell genre.





Just Click The Button is a game about clicking on a button. The more you click the button, the more the game evolves. Level up, acquire new abilitites, choose your playstyle, and build a powerful button!

The game can be played idefenetly, allowing you to aquire (almost) every single ability, which will then cause there to be way too much stuff going at once. Or attemt to beat the game. The game can be beated via 1 of 4 endings. Some builds will make certain endings easier than others, which encourages you to choose specific abilities for whatever ending you will attempt.
